steps.nodeStepDescription:
Standard sniper zoom. 
Highlights enemies with low health.

Light, low-zoom sniper scope. 
Improves weapon handling.

Long-distance scope. 
Increased range, slower handling.
Reduces the severity of this weapon’s recoil.
It's easier to aim under fire using this weapon.
Expect to find more ammo for this weapon.
Precision kills with this weapon dramatically increase reload speed.
Gain bonus accuracy while crouched.
This weapon has increased stability.
Optical zoom length is increased while crouched.
Chance to return a portion of the magazine after an assist.
Increases the reload speed of this weapon when its mag is empty.
Kills with this weapon increase reload speed for a short time.
Kills with this weapon have the chance to grant bonus reserve ammo.
A kill with the final round in the magazine increases reload speed.
Increased accuracy, handling and damage resistance when shooting this weapon from behind cover.

Oversize rounds built to stagger targets and leave them reeling.
Their mass makes a weapon harder to handle.
Volatile payload explodes on impact, dealing a portion of the weapon's damage in an area.
This weapon has extremely low recoil.

Aiming this weapon is incredibly fast.
This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.

These iridium-core rounds overpenetrate targets.
Their mass slows down weapon handling.
This weapon causes Void Damage.
This weapon causes Solar Damage.
This weapon causes Arc Damage.
